medium: Silk, cotton, wool; cross-stitch, slanted buttonhole stitch, double chain stitch, chain stitch
title: At torba ilgich
description: Fringe with plain-weave heading, cloth band, One Jacquard woven band, three wide embroidered bands, Pieced, printed lining. Red wool ground with polychrome silk and synthetic embroidery. The attached bands on the sides and bottom edge are entirely cross-stitched in wilk on cotton. The top band, under the fringe is tan cotton damask. The fringe is cotton, and there is a striped woven cotton binding on the edges. The cotton backing is secured with adhesive.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
